abstract: Coffin containing remains of King Richard III is paraded through streets of Leicester, England, before formal reburial at Anglican cathedral; procession begins week of ceremonies dedicated to restoration of king who has been vilified for hundreds of years.
lead_paragraph: Officials said that the crowds in Leicester, England, were heavier for the procession of King Richard III’s remains on Sunday than they were in 2012, when Queen Elizabeth II visited the city.

headline.main: Richard III, Previous Visit a Bust, Is Warmly Received 530 Years Later
headline.print_headline: Richard III, Previous Visit a Bust, Is Warmly Received 530 Years Later
